import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({match}) { const [products , setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
go Back

{product.name}

 price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} price: ${product.price} status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'in stock': 'out of stock' }
) } export default ProductScreen
